com.netflix.genie.server.persistence

Class PersistenceManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.persistence.PersistenceManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class that must be persisted in the database

    public class PersistenceManager<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic PersistenceManager utility class that will be shared across various services.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ENTITY_ALIAS
      The alias to be used to represent the entity for the query.
      static int MAX_PAGE_SIZE
      The maximum number of entries to be returned.
